entities.name: SOLORIGATE
entities.description: A cyberattack uncovered in late 2020, also known as Nobelium, involving a supply chain attack where malware was introduced to a software provider's customers through software updates.

entities.name: NOBELIUM
entities.description: Another name for the Solorigate cyberattack uncovered in late 2020, involving a supply chain attack where malware was introduced to a software provider's customers through software updates.

relationships.relationship_description: Solorigate and Nobelium refer to the same cyberattack uncovered in late 2020.
